Description.Text: Rooms with kitchenette, big bathroom with bathtub and private balcony with panoramic views of the Aegean Sea, safe deposit box, individual climatic control system, electronic smart key locks, fridge, direct dial telephone & daily maid service. Wheelchair access for the disable. Built in 2010.

Located on the south east coast of Chios island, on a quiet location of 5.000 square meters property alongside the sea, just 200m south from the main beach of Karfas Bay. Chios international Airport - 5km, Chios main harbor - 7km.
